title: The PPR Search Detail Results Schema to hold search Financing Statement details from the second step in the search process

searchDateTime.description: The UTC date and time the system executed the search query (search step one).

exactResultsSize.description: Set by the Registry, the number of exact match Financing Statements included in the response.

similarResultsSize.description: Set by the Registry, the number of similar match Financing Statements included in the response.

totalResultsSize.description: The total number or Registration matches total number of Financing Statements included in the response.
